text: [Vspomni, Mukhammad,] kak Allakh pokazal tebe vo sne nevernykh malochislennymi. A yesli by On pokazal tebe ikh mnogochislennymi, to tvoi posledovateli lishilis' by muzhestva i stali prerekat'sya o [gryadushchem] srazhenii. Odnako Allakh spas vas [ot trusosti i prepiratel'stv], ibo On vedayet o tom, chto v serdtsakh
